explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the application of ensemble learning techniques, which are a subset of machine learning, to pay-per-click campaign classification.
explanations.supervised learning: The research involves classification models like Naive Bayes, logistic regression, decision trees, and SVMs, which are all supervised learning methods.
explanations.classification: The paper focuses on classifying pay-per-click campaigns to predict their profitability, using various classification models and ensemble techniques.
explanations.support vector machine: The paper mentions the use of Support Vector Machines (SVM) as one of the base classification models compared with ensemble learning techniques.
explanations.SVM: SVM is explicitly mentioned as one of the base classification models used in the research.
explanations.decision tree: Decision trees are listed as one of the base classification models compared with ensemble learning methods in the study.
